nodes.text: The Kesla Vein pumping station was a water pumping station in the small town of Kesla Vein on the planet Nam Chorios. In 44 ABY, here there was the first confront between the Jedi Grand Master Luke Skywalker, his son, Jedi Knight Ben Skywalker, and their friend, Sith apprentice Vestara Khai and a group of Sith led by Sith Saber Tola Annax, both in searching the dark side being Abeloth, who had achieved control over the native Theran Listeners Force organization. However, the jedi escape the confrontation and continued the search of Abeloth.
